mapper.select: SELECT pc_name, pc_code, pc_codeRef, pc_state FROM PRO_CATEGORY

SELECT p_seq, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_image1, p_image2, p_regdate, pc_code, p_state, p_option, if(p_cost = 0, '', p_cost) AS p_cost, p_group, p_deliveryType, CASE p_deliveryType WHEN "D" THEN "일반배송" WHEN "R" THEN "로켓배송" WHEN "RF" THEN "로켓프레시" END AS p_delivery FROM PRO

SELECT pc.pc_name, p.pc_code, pc.pc_codeRef, p_seq, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_image1, p_image2, p_regdate, p_option, if(p_cost = 0, '', p_cost) AS p_cost, p_group, p_state, p_deliveryType, CASE p_deliveryType WHEN "D" THEN "일반배송" WHEN "R" THEN "로켓배송" WHEN "RF" THEN "로켓프레시" END AS p_delivery FROM PRO p INNER JOIN PRO_CATEGORY pc ON p.pc_code = pc.pc_code WHERE pc_codeRef = #{pc_codeRef}

SELECT pc.pc_name, p.pc_code, pc.pc_codeRef, p_seq, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_image1, p_image2, p_regdate, p_option, if(p_cost = 0, '', p_cost) AS p_cost, p_group, p_state, p_deliveryType, CASE p_deliveryType WHEN "D" THEN "일반배송" WHEN "R" THEN "로켓배송" WHEN "RF" THEN "로켓프레시" END AS p_delivery FROM PRO p INNER JOIN PRO_CATEGORY pc ON p.pc_code = pc.pc_code WHERE p.pc_code = #{pc_code}

SELECT p_seq, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_image1, p_image2, p_regdate, pc_code, p_state, p_option, if(p_cost = 0, '', p_cost) AS p_cost, p_group, p_deliveryType, CASE p_deliveryType WHEN "D" THEN "일반배송" WHEN "R" THEN "로켓배송" WHEN "RF" THEN "로켓프레시" END AS p_delivery FROM (SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS no, A.* FROM (SELECT p_seq, p_name, p_price, p_stock, p_image1, p_image2, p_regdate, pc_code, p_state, p_option, if(p_cost = 0, '', p_cost) AS p_cost, p_group, p_deliveryType, CASE p_deliveryType WHEN "D" THEN "일반배송" WHEN "R" THEN "로켓배송" WHEN "RF" THEN "로켓프레시" END AS p_delivery FROM PRO, (SELECT @rownum := 0) A) A ORDER BY p_seq DESC )A WHERE no BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
